#summary Remove a generic key/value pair.
#labels Protocol-Generic

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||RemoveGeneric||String||Yes||
||`OwnerID`||UUID of the user the entry belongs to||UUID||Yes||
||`Type`||Type of key/value pair to remove||String||Yes||
||`Key`||The key to remove||String||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=RemoveGeneric
&OwnerID=e4709e21-9a3f-4276-b3cc-22224bdf0199
&Type=Friend
&Key=990ea180-2828-11df-8a39-0800200c9a66
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the entry was removed or did not exist, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
